titles.title: Put On The Garments Of Praise

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Put on the garments of praise
For the spirit of heaviness;
Lift up your voice to God.
Pray in the Spirit and with understanding.
O, magnify the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All you that mourn in Zion
I have authority.
To appoint unto you in Zion
Oil of joy that will set you free.

verse.name: v3
